title: [Large-scale] Science Classroom Creativity Assessment and Language Expression Promotion Strategy Development Program

context.prior_knowledge: Methodologies for developing creativity assessment tools, foundational science pedagogy, experience designing project-based assessments, understanding of educational language expression techniques
context.additional_context: Application and analysis of creativity assessment tools in smartphone-based VR simulation environments. It focuses on systematically evaluating linguistic interactions (discussions, report writing, etc.) occurring during the scientific inquiry process.

learning_goals: Learners can develop text-based analysis capabilities for science classroom creativity assessment tools based on nine elements (cognitive/affective characteristics, class participation, classroom environment, teacher support, individual/group creative behaviors).
Learners can interpret creativity data collected in a simulation environment to propose three or more personalized instructional design strategies and link them to language expression activities.
Learners can develop creativity-promoting instructional models through project-based assessment and improve them using language feedback techniques during peer evaluation.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
